title: Curecanti National Recreation Area: Natural Features & Ecosystems
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Nature     Natural Features & Ecosystems               Natural Features & Ecosystems        The natural features and ecosystems of Curecanti not only vary from the east to west, but also from canyon rim to bottom. (above, Morrow Point Reservoir) NPS Photo by Lisa Lynch       Life Zones » The Geologic Story » Video: Geology and Paleontology »
